data.title: Dimitri Marick: 1991-2001 Quiz
data.meta_description: Tragically, Michael Nader passed away in 2021. To honor the great All My Children character he played, Dimitri Marick, this quiz will feature questions on all the years Dimitri graced the TV screens while in Pine Valley. All air dates are American.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. In 1991, Dimitri rescued a woman from the well on his estate of Wildwind. Which woman at Wildwind helped nurse this woman back to health?

Answer: Helga Voynitzeva

Dimitri rescued Natalie after her demented sister, Janet, trapped her in the well on the Wildwind estate. During Natalie's recuperating, his mother-in-law, Helga Voynitzeva, nursed Natalie back to health.

2. In 1992, who revealed that Dimitri's wife, Angelique, was alive?

Answer: Helga Voynitzeva

Dimitri and Natalie fell in love and got engaged. In a shocking moment at their engagement party, Helga wheeled out a very much alive Angelique. She had been declared dead, yet had been in a coma for fifteen years. Natalie immediately broke off her engagement with Dimitri.

3. In 1993, Dimitri married which woman?

Answer: Erica Kane

Dimitri and Erica had a whirlwind of a romance over the time he was in Pine Valley. The duo ended up getting hitched for the first time in June of 1993. Their wedding party also included Erica's newly discovered biological daughter, Kendall Hart.

4. In 1994, Erica accidentally rear ended Dimitri's car. Who was riding in the passenger's seat of Erica's car at that time?

Answer: Opal Cortlandt

Erica and Opal were enjoying a lovely night out. While Erica was driving, Opal alerted her that she ran a stop sign, then yelled at Erica to stop. It was too late, considering that Erica rear ended Dimitri. Dimitri and Erica had a heated argument.

5. In 1995, which man became Dimitri's adversary?

Answer: Jonathan Kinder

After Erica's injury in May/1995, she received treatment from Dr. Jonathan Kinder. Dimitri became suspicious of him when Erica cultivated an addiction to prescription painkillers. This led to him clashing with Dr. Kinder over what he perceived to be him deliberately overmedicating Erica.

6. In 1996, Dimitri had a one night stand with Maria at what Wildwind location?

Answer: The hunting lodge

Dimitri was hurt when he saw what appeared to be Jonathan and Erica sleeping together so he ran to the hunting lodge in tears. Maria showed up shortly thereafter and he consoled her after she revealed that Edmund took baby Sam out of her arms at the airport to return him to Kelsey.

The two succumbed to passion and had a one night stand at the hunting lodge. Both of them immediately regretted what they had done, as Dimitri was still wed to Erica while Maria was married to Edmund.

7. In 1997, where did Dimitri make the surprise announcement that he and Gloria had gotten married?

Answer: Courthouse

Gloria had been subpoenaed as a witness in Erica's trial for kidnapping Maddie Gray. When they got to the courthouse, the judge asked for "Gloria Marsh". Dimitri advised everyone that she was now "Gloria Marick". The two divorced shortly thereafter after Dimitri deceived Gloria about Maddie's true paternity.

8. In 1998, which person saved Dimitri and Edmund's lives?

Answer: Tad Martin

Jim Thomasen had imprisoned Edmund in an aqueduct after Edmund began investigating his involvement in the plane crash from August/1997. Edmund and Dimitri were eventually imprisoned together and a storm came one night. Tad managed to track them down and save both of the men.

9. In 1999, Dimitri defended which person at the Crystal Ball?

Answer: Ryan Lavery

At the second annual Crystal Ball, Derek arrived to announce that he was arresting Ryan Lavery for raping Kit Fisher. While some people were on Kit's side, Dimitri said that he believed Ryan was innocent of the crime. While at the Crystal Ball, Dimitri's date for the evening, Erica, revealed that Kit Fisher had previously falsely accused Tad of rape.

10. In 2000 and 2001, which person helped Dimitri look for Alexandra?

Answer: Edmund Gray

Alexandra had disappeared in November/2000 when Ryan held a party on his boat to celebrate his online venture, IncredibleDreams.com. At the party, Alex was confronted by a mysterious man and wound up disappearing. For three months, Edmund and Dimitri looked for her and eventually found her in Canada.

They were surprised to see that Alexandra had reunited with her recently returned from the dead twin sister, Anna Devane. Alexandra's three month disappearance was written into the show to accommodate actress Finola Hughes going on maternity leave.

Source: Author CAGuy0206

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor ladymacb29 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
